CodeplexIssue.Title: Syntactical issue with parametrized properties
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml: for properties with optional parameters and 0 properties in the minimal version you need the get_ Method overload to use them, but the get_ Overload is hidden in intellisense. this is a good way. task: clearify the situation and make the get_ overloads visible in Intellisense in this situation.
